Abbie Cornish's relationship refers to the romantic or intimate partnerships that Australian actress Abbie Cornish has been involved in throughout her life.

Cornish has had several high-profile relationships, including with actor Ryan Phillippe, with whom she was in a relationship from 2007 to 2010. She also dated musician Harry Styles in 2015. Cornish is currently in a relationship with actor Luke Hemsworth, with whom she has been dating since 2019.

Cornish's relationships have been a subject of media attention, and she has often been photographed with her partners at events and on red carpets. She has also spoken about her relationships in interviews, saying that she values her privacy and tries to keep her personal life out of the public eye.
